summary: The diff shows edits to `VideoHubPage.tsx`, but the provided truncation does not include the channel detail rendering logic needed to verify the embed-vs-redirect behavior. Additionally, two unrelated files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) were modified even though the request required focused changes only for the Kids YouTube Videos Hub page and no unrelated module/metadata updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: When `embedBlocked` is true, the channel detail view must not render an embedded player and must show the existing CTA to open `channelUrl` on YouTube.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet only shows data/interface changes and channel entries with `embedBlocked`, but does not include the channel detail view rendering logic where the iframe would be conditionally omitted and the CTA shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: When `embedBlocked` is not true, the channel detail view must render an on-site embedded player using the channelâ€™s existing `embedUrl` inside the existing `aspect-video` container.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet does not show any `<iframe>` or `aspect-video` container rendering, so it cannot be confirmed that embedding is implemented for allowed channels.

missing_requirements.requirement: Embedded player iframe must include appropriate attributes (e.g., `allow` autoplay/encrypted-media/fullscreen as needed) and use the existing `youtube-nocookie.com` embed URLs already present in channel data.
missing_requirements.reason: While `embedUrl` values shown use `youtube-nocookie.com`, the iframe itself and its attributes are not visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: A visible "Watch on YouTube" button/link must remain available in the channel detail view regardless of embed status, using `channelUrl` and opening in a new tab.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff does not show the channel detail view UI, so presence of a persistent "Watch on YouTube" link/button and `target=_blank` behavior cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other pages, navigation, CRUD flows, or backend code are changed (focused change limited to `VideoHubPage.tsx`).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes modifications to additional files that are not part of the requested `VideoHubPage.tsx` update.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added large descriptive content in `frontend-file-summaries.txt` unrelated to the Kids YouTube Videos Hub request.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to update `frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx` with embed-blocked behavior; it does not request changes to repository summary/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` including entries referencing Art Gallery and other feature requests/status tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating project tracking/state files; it also explicitly says not to change unrelated modules like Art Gallery/Admin Dashboard.
